in diameter and 10.16 cm in height, placed at a

recoil detection in a scintillating scatterer.
n-gamma pulse shape discrimination on the
NE213 scintillator used with unpolarized neutrons.
used as a scatterer. One NE213 liquid scintillator
used with the unpolarized neutron beam.
A NaI(Tl) crystal placed coaxially below
the scatterer to detect the 4.44 MeV deexcitation
gamma-rays correlated to neutron spin-flip events.

x4code.headerHelp: Error in value of quantity, defined under ERR-ANALYS

x4freetext: The quoted error bars contain the uncer-
* depolarization effects in the solenoid and
which were all treated as standard deviations.
The relative uncertainty of about 7.4% in
the primary neutron polarization is not included
in the errors and must be regarded as uncertainty
